short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checq DNS information of the current tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Checq is an Chrome Extension that enables the user to retrieve the DNS information for the currently opened tab. 

The Chrome extension is a port for the original tool available at: https://checq.intercube.io
